Description.Text: Lying on the golden sandy beach of Platanias, Indigo Mare offers a swimming pool with an elegant restaurant-pool bar, a mini market and self-catering studios and apartments with private balconies. Indigo Mare studios and apartments are tastefully designed and include a kitchenette with refrigerator, satellite TV and balcony with wonderful view of the sea or the garden. The Indigo Mare restaurant-pool bar serves local and Mediterranean home-cooked meals, as well as vegetarian dishes. Children's menus and high chairs are provided. Children enjoy their own pool, while the childrenâ€™s playground, games room and nursery ensure plenty of fun moments for younger hotel guests. There is also a recreation area with billiards and table tennis on site.

Indigo Mare is located only 450 meters from the main square of Platanias village.It is 15 minutes drive from the centre of Chania, where you can visit the world-known Venetian port and the archaeological sites of ancient Minoan Kydonia. The airport is 30 minutes drive away and the port of Souda 20 minutes, both through national road.
